summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented in ContactCtaSection.tsx (exact h2/p copy and added data-testid hooks, with explicit centering). However, the diff also changes elements/files beyond the two specified h2 and p, violating the constraint and REQ-2’s “only selected elements” limitation.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified the wrapper <div> around the selected h2/p by adding/changing classes (e.g., "content-wrapper-mobile text-center mb-12"), which is beyond the requested change scope of ONLY the selected h2 and p.
hallucinated_features.reason:
BuildRequest constraint and REQ-2 AC explicitly require applying changes ONLY to the selected

and

, and adding hooks/changes to no other elements in ContactCtaSection.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified additional files unrelated to updating only the selected h2/p elements (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint says to apply changes ONLY to the two user-selected elements; these file modifications are out of scope for the requested UI change.
